result.eng: An allowance will be awarded by virtue of Article 279.
result.html: Tabharfar liúntas de bhua Alt 279An allowance will be awarded by virtue of Article 279.
result.ponchtml: Taḃarfar liúntas de ḃua Alt 279An allowance will be awarded by virtue of Article 279.

result.eng: We are subject to obligations by virtue of our membership in the European Union.
result.ga: Leagtar dualgais orainn go reachtúil de bhua ár mballraíochta san Aontas Eorpach

result.ponchtml: Leagtar dualgais orainn go reaċtúil de ḃua ár mballraíoċta san Aontas EorpaċWe are subject to obligations by virtue of our membership in the European Union.

result.eng: The Governor is subject to limitations by virtue of the Central Bank Act.
